description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"a5fo1","text":"- This is an immunohistochemistry protocol used for evaluation of pathology in mouse brain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9k78t","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lcep","text":"- We successfully detected Gfap, Iba1, CD68, TH and alpha-Syn and phospho S129 alpha synuclein protein expression using this
protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cljm","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evalm","text":"- In this protocol, floating sections are mounted on slides first before starting blocking step. In this way, large number of sections can
be stained more efficiently. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4umc","text":"

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"eft3o","text":"30 um thickness of floating tissue sections in PBS with 0.1% sodium azide.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52pif","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fh01","text":"- Washing: Glass Coplin jar","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ernh0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eli5v","text":"- PBST: PBS 1X + 0.05% Tween20 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7t56d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpfr2","text":"- Normal Goat Serum Blocking Solution:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahshe","text":"2% goat serum (blocking)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25v3s","text":"1%BSA (stabilizer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jpb2","text":"0.1% cold fish skin gelatin (blocking)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3e1","text":"0.1% Triton X-100 (penetration enhancer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a54bj","text":"0.05% Tween 20 (detergent and surface tension reducer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ap0l","text":"0.05% sodium azide (preservative)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12ndp","text":"0.01M PBS, pH 7.2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an3a3","text":"   Mix well and store at 4 ºC for up to 6 months.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5n5uf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ttgp","text":"- Primary Antibody Dilution Buffer      
1%BSA (blocking & stabilizer)    
0.1% cold fish skin gelatin (blocking)        
0.5% Triton X-100 (penetration enhancer)        
0.05% sodium azide (preservative)        
0.01M PBS, pH 7.2-7.4 
    Mix well and store at 4 ºC. up to 6 months.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2du31","text":"
- Secondary Antibody Dilution Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9g5jf","text":" 0.01M PBS, pH 7.2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmbc7","text":"0.05% Tween 20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap0sj","text":"
- List of antibodies used for neuropathology evaluation with IHC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ju2k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qjs0","text":"     Antibodies      Cat#      Company      dilution        Anti-Synuclein
  α Antibody      AB5038      Sigma-Aldrich      1:1000        Recombinant
  Anti-Alpha-synuclein (phospho S129) antibody [EP1536Y]      ab51253      Abcam      1:1000        GFAP

  Hydroxylase      AB152      Sigma-Aldrich      1:1000        Anti-CD68
  antibody      ab125212      Abcam      1:1000        Goat

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dc9pg","text":"       Mount floating sections onto slides and dry for   (\u003c45 min), While section drying, PAP pen drawing line and dry  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":119,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2u3ne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"41A5A4702D8C11EEB908B35E56DBC611","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"58AC1CD02D8C11EEB908B35E56DBC611","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
